Say.text: No visitors! I'm very - Oh! Aren't you delicious. All right, little one, you like to stick your neck out?

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Cull that flock, kitten. Come back when you've drunk your fill.

Say.text: Child. Whether safely under my wing or alone on the street, make no mistake... You are ALWAYS food.
